summary.span: 包含提供 Managed 程式碼存取權給 Windows 7 工作列進階功能的類型。

span.span: Contains types that provide managed code access to the enhanced functionality of the Windows 7 taskbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列提供增強的功能，可讓您使用的工作列按鈕傳達給使用者的狀態，並公開一般工作，視窗最小化或隱藏時。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality that enables you to use the taskbar button to communicate status to a user and expose common tasks when the window is minimized or hidden. 中的型別所公開的功能命名空間不是之前的 Windows 版本中可用[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The functionality exposed by the types in the namespace is not available in versions of Windows prior to [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 在 [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]，某些功能可能無法根據使用者的設定。In [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)], some functionality might not be available depending on the user's settings.
